SELECT 'user' AS itemType ,'so' AS so #고정값 확인필요 , ur.UserID , ur.UserCode AS AN , ur.MultiDisplayName AS DN , CONCAT(bg.JobLevelCode,'|',bg.MultiJobLevelName) AS LV , CONCAT(bg.JobTitleCode,'|',bg.MultiJobTitleName) AS TL , CONCAT(bg.JobPositionCode,'|',bg.MultiJobPositionName) AS PO , ur.Mobile AS MT #기존 AD_Mobile , ur.Mobile , ur.MailAddress AS EM #기존 EX_PrimaryMail , ur.PhoneNumber AS OT #기존 AD_PhoneNumber , ur.FAX -- , ur.MSN_SipAddress AS SIP 삭제됨 , ur.EmpNo AS USEC , bg.DeptCode AS RG , bg.DeptCode AS SG , bg.MultiDeptName AS RGNM , bg.MultiDeptName AS SGNM , bg.CompanyCode AS ETID , bg.MultiCompanyName AS ETNM , IFNULL(bg.JobType,'Origin') AS JobType , ur.UserCode , bg.MultiDeptName AS ExGroupName , ur.PhoneNumberInter , ur.ChargeBusiness , ur.PhotoPath , CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') >= IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(info.AbsenseTermStart, '%Y%m%d'), 0) AND IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(info.AbsenseTermEnd, '%Y%m%d'), 0) >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND info.AbsenseUseYN != 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS AbsenseUseYN
, IFNULL(( SELECT VI.VacFlag FROM covi_smart4j.vm_vacationinfo_day VI WHERE UR_Code = ur.UserCode AND VI.VacDate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') #반차의 경우, 기준점 필요. 13시로 기준 정의. 반차 구분 코드도 하드코딩 되어 있음. AND IF ( (VacOffFlag IN ('AM', 'PM')), (CASE WHEN VacOffFlag = 'AM' AND HOUR(NOW()) < 13 THEN 1 WHEN VacOffFlag = 'PM' AND HOUR(NOW()) >= 13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) , 1 ) > 0 ORDER BY VacOffFlag desc LIMIT 1 ), '') as VacStatus , IFNULL(( SELECT CASE WHEN attEndTime IS NOT NULL THEN 'lbl_att_offWork' WHEN attEndTime IS NULL THEN 'lbl_att_goWork' ELSE NULL END FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_commuting_mst acm WHERE acm.UserCode = ur.UserCode AND targetDate = DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(now(),0), '%Y-%m-%d') AND length(attStartTime) > 0 ), 'lbl_n_att_absent') AS AttendStatus , IFNULL(( SELECT CONCAT(amh.JobStsName,';',StartTime,';',EndTime,';',ETC) FROM covi_smart4j.attendance_mng_job_history amh WHERE amh.UserCode = ur.UserCode AND JobDate = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') # 시차 적용방법 검토 AND now() >= date_format(concat(amh.JobDate, ' ', left(amh.StartTime, 2), ':', right(amh.StartTime, 2)), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND now() < date_format(concat(amh.JobDate, ' ', left(amh.EndTime, 2), ':', right(amh.EndTime, 2)), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ),'') AS JobStatus

AND bg.MultiJobTitleName like CONCAT('%',#{searchText} ,'%')
AND (replace(ur.Mobile,'-','') like CONCAT('%',replace(#{searchText},'-',''),'%') or ur.Mobile like CONCAT('%',replace(#{searchText},'-',''),'%') )

AND ur.MailAddress like CONCAT('%',#{searchText} ,'%')

SELECT a. UserCode ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, a.MultiDisplayName) AS UserName , MailAddress , Mobile
, Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, b.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName
FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS a LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup AS b ON a.UserCode = b.UserCode
AND a.IsUse = 'Y' AND a.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND b.JobType = 'Origin'
AND a.MultiDisplayName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{UserName} ,'%')
AND (a.MultiDisplayName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{UserName} ,'%') OR a.MailAddress LIKE CONCAT('%', #{MailAddress} ,'%'))
AND b.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
ORDER BY UserName DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.UserCode AS Code , 'UR' AS Type , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, a.MultiDisplayName) AS Name , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, b.MultiDeptName) AS DeptName , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, b.MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName , PhotoPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS a LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup AS b ON a.UserCode = b.UserCode WHERE a.IsUse = 'Y' AND a.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND b.JobType = 'Origin' AND b.CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode}
UNION
SELECT GroupCode AS Code , IF(GroupType='Company','CM','GR') AS Type , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDisplayName) AS Name , '' AS DeptName , '' AS JobLevelName , '' AS PhotoPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group WHERE IsUse = 'Y' AND IsDisplay = 'Y' AND GroupType IN ('Community','Company','Dept','JobLevel','JobPosition','JobTitle','Manage','Officer','Region') AND CompanyCode = #{CompanyCode} ) AS Temp
WHERE Name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{KeyWord} ,'%')
ORDER BY Name ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT 'group' AS itemType ,gr.CompanyCode ,gr.GroupCode ,gr.GroupType ,gr.MultiDisplayName AS GroupName ,cn.MultiDisplayName AS CompanyName ,gr.PrimaryMail ,gr.MemberOf ,gr.GroupCode AS AN ,gr.MultiDisplayName AS DN ,gr.PrimaryMail AS EM ,cn.CompanyCode AS ETID ,cn.MultiDisplayName AS ETNM ,gr.MemberOf AS SGAN ,gr.MemberOf AS SGDN ,gr.Receivable AS RCV ,gr.SortPath ,gr.GroupPath ,gr.GroupID ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS self WHERE self.MemberOf =gr.GroupCode AND self.IsUse = 'Y' AND self.IsDisplay = 'Y') AS hasChild , REPLACE(covi_smart4j.sys_getFullPathLang(gr.GroupCode,#{lang}),'@','>') AS GroupFullPath , gr.Approvable AS Approvable , gr.Receivable AS Receivable , gr.ISMAIL AS "IsMail" FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS gr LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS cn ON gr.CompanyCode = cn.GroupCode AND cn.GroupType = 'Company'
AND gr.IsUse = 'Y' AND gr.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND (gr.MemberOf != 'NOUSE' OR gr.MemberOf is null) #향후 그룹의 IsUse나 IsDisplay이를 변경한 경우 해당 그룹에 속한 다른 그룹들도 상태 변경하도록 한다. (운영용) AND (gr.MemberOf != 'NOUNIT' OR gr.MemberOf is null)
AND gr.GroupType IN ('Dept','Company')
AND gr.GroupType != 'Dept'
AND ((gr.GroupPath REGEXP(CONCAT(CONCAT('_Community', ';'), (SELECT CU_Code FROM COMMUNITY WHERE CU_ID = #{communityId})))) OR (gr.GroupPath NOT REGEXP(CONCAT('_Community', ';'))) )
AND gr.memberOf = #{memberOf}
AND gr.CompanyCode =#{companyCode}
SortPath asc

SELECT 'user' AS itemType , ur.UserID , ur.UserCode AS AN , ur.MultiDisplayName AS DN , CONCAT(bg.JobLevelCode,'|',bg.MultiJobLevelName) AS LV , CONCAT(bg.JobTitleCode,'|',bg.MultiJobTitleName) AS TL , CONCAT(bg.JobPositionCode,'|',bg.MultiJobPositionName) AS PO , ur.Mobile AS MT #기존 AD_Mobile , ur.Mobile , ur.MailAddress AS EM #기존 EX_PrimaryMail , ur.PhoneNumber AS OT #기존 AD_PhoneNumber , ur.FAX , ur.EmpNo AS USEC , bg.DeptCode AS RG , bg.DeptCode AS SG , bg.MultiDeptName AS RGNM , bg.MultiDeptName AS SGNM , bg.CompanyCode AS ETID , bg.MultiCompanyName AS ETNM , IFNULL(bg.JobType,'Origin') AS JobType , ur.UserCode , bg.MultiDeptName AS ExGroupName , ur.PhoneNumberInter , ur.ChargeBusiness , ur.PhotoPath
FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup AS bg JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS ur ON ur.UserCode = bg.UserCode WHERE bg.JobType = 'Origin' AND ur.UserCode IN
#{item}
Order By (ur.SortKey+0) ASC, bg.JobTitleSortKey ASC, bg.JobLevelSortKey ASC, bg.JobTitlecode ASC, ur.EnterDate ASC, DN ASC

SELECT 'group' AS itemType ,gr.CompanyCode ,gr.GroupCode ,gr.GroupType ,gr.MultiDisplayName AS GroupName ,cn.MultiDisplayName AS CompanyName ,gr.PrimaryMail ,gr.MemberOf ,gr.GroupCode AS AN ,gr.MultiDisplayName AS DN ,gr.PrimaryMail AS EM ,cn.CompanyCode AS ETID ,cn.MultiDisplayName AS ETNM ,gr.MemberOf AS SGAN ,gr.MemberOf AS SGDN ,gr.Receivable AS RCV ,gr.SortPath ,gr.GroupPath ,gr.GroupID FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS gr LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group AS cn ON gr.CompanyCode = cn.GroupCode AND cn.GroupType = 'Company'
